title: Ondřej Šourek
text:
Ondřej Šourek (born 26 April 1983 in <a href="Lede%C4%8D%20nad%20S%C3%A1zavou">Ledeč nad Sázavou</a>) is former <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> central defender.
Career.
Club.
In May 2011, he joined Polish club <a href="Podbeskidzie%20Bielsko-Bia%C5%82a">Podbeskidzie Bielsko-Biała</a> on a two-year contract.
International.
He was a part of Czech Republic U-20 and <a href="Czech%20Republic%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">U-21</a> teams.
